ai-thag7.2:1.1_0: Bhaddiya has plucked out craving, root and all,
ai-thag7.2:1.3_0: and plucked out craving, root and all,
ai-thag7.2:1.4_0: he practices absorption; he is truly well-favoured.
ai-thag7.2:2.2_0: in arched harps, and in cymbals.
ai-thag7.2:2.3_0: I’ve been reborn in the root of a tree,
ai-thag7.2:2.4_0: I delight in the Buddha’s teaching.
ai-thag7.2:3.1_0: If the Buddha were to grant me one wish,
ai-thag7.2:3.2_0: and I were to get what I wished for,
ai-thag7.2:3.3_0: he has counted the whole world.
ai-thag7.2:4.1_0: Those who’ve judged me on appearance,
ai-thag7.2:4.2_0: and those swayed by my voice,
ai-thag7.2:4.3_0: are full of desire and greed;
ai-thag7.2:5.1_0: nor do they know what’s inside,
ai-thag7.2:5.3_0: But the fool is crossed over on all sides.
ai-thag7.2:5.4_0: gets carried away by a voice.
ai-thag7.2:6.1_0: nor do they know what’s inside,
ai-thag7.2:6.4_0: they’re also carried away by a voice.
ai-thag7.2:7.4_0: they don’t get carried away by a voice.”
